contentrichtext.text: [[Image:LocatieMaasbracht.png|thumb|Former municipality of Maasbracht in Limburg.]] '''Maasbracht''' ({{Pronunciation|143 Maasbracht.ogg}}) is a [[town]] in the southeastern [[Netherlands]]. It was a separate municipality until January 1, 2007, when it became a part of the new municipality of [[Maasgouw]]. Footballer [[Mark van Bommel]] was born in Maasbracht. <gallery> Image:Maasbracht, stadszicht bij Julianakanaal 2007-09-22 17.10.JPG|Maasbracht, the village near Julianakanaal Image:Maasbracht, kerk 2007-09-22 17.19 .JPG|Maasbracht, church </gallery> ==External links== *[http://www.gemeentemaasgouw.nl Official website] {{coord|51|09|N|5|53|E|region:NL_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Netherlands)]] [[Category:Populated places in Limburg (Netherlands)]] {{LimburgNL-geo-stub}}
